long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Need a little extra joy added to your everyday web browsing? How about a little furry friend to help make it through those extra long articles? With a quick click you can easily add friends to any web page! Not happy yet with just one, keep clicking 'Cats App!' icon until you've had your fill. If you have too many friends starting to block your view, simply click the cat on screen and they'll scurry on home until you need them again.
